objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD FspR7-SPEQ-MIB::transientGainDynamicAdjustSpeq FspR7-SPEQ-MIB::speqEntityIndex i 9999 ADVA-MIB::neEventLogTimeStamp s EXAMPLEE ADVA-MIB::neEventLogIdentityTranslation s EXAMPLE

description: Existing adress index
variables.name: FspR7-SPEQ-MIB::speqEntityIndex

description: The NE Date and Time when the event (trap) occurred. This
object is used in the trap varbind.
variables.name: ADVA-MIB::neEventLogTimeStamp

description: Translation of entPhysicalIndex/ifIndex or other identifier
to a string used in the trap varbind following the timestamp
varbind.
variables.name: ADVA-MIB::neEventLogIdentityTranslation

description: Amplifier Auto Shutdown Enabled
